Text:
Thanks for this.

Also, this is the new English dub version, not the old one with Leonardo's voice as Kaneda.  I thought some people would want to know that in case they were looking for the older version.

The quality Is superb.. but when It comes to the dubbing I must say that this hand drawn masterpiece needs to be seen with the ORIGINAL JAPANEESE ACTORS actually ACTING to the pictures. No wonder this film took seven years to make. Well I just cant cope with american voices on this..
I prefer subtitles and the ORIGINAL version.
I prefer subtitles on the ORIGINAL sound.
Did they also add extra drum beats on this version?  So corny..
thanks for the tip on the english track. im currently looking for the old dub. i almost downloaded this one too.
I have the original dub in english on VHS tape and I don't know why it is still sealed.I guess I didn't beleive dvd was gonna ever replace my VCR.
Allow me to briefly interject that every asshole manga-reader who comes on to "[eng]" torrents to bitch that they're not subtitled Japanese -- can just swallow me to the hilt.
Awwww, it's not the Streamline version.
Thanks for the uber fast upload guys!

Stop being a self-important twat.
